title: 客户端崩溃 求助！
author: ww龙mc
txt_content:
错误报告如下



crash-2019-12-12_18.52.40-client.txt
(8.58 KB, 下载次数: 4)



2019-12-12 18:56 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Caused by: java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: wealthyturtle/uiesingularities/UniversalSingularityMod : Unsupported major.minor version 52.0

请使用 java 8

replies.author: catserver
replies.txt_content:
Java Version: 1.7.0, Oracle Corporation
什么年代了还在用java7应该用java8
